meanings.definition: A woman who flirts or behaves in a teasing manner.
meanings.sent1: The group of coquettes giggled and batted their eyelashes at the party.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the queen of coquettes in the town.
meanings.sent3: The coquettes at the cafe were playfully twirling their hair to get attention.
meanings.sent4: Her friends jokingly called her the master of coquettes due to her charming ways.
meanings.sent5: The image of the coquettes in the movie was captivating and alluring.

meanings.definition: To flirt or behave in a teasing manner.
meanings.sent1: He coquettes with everyone he meets, making them smile with his playful banter.
meanings.sent2: She coquettes subtly, leaving a trail of admirers wherever she goes.
meanings.sent3: The cat coquettes with the feather toy, pouncing and retreating in a playful dance.
meanings.sent4: The wind coquettes with the leaves, swirling them in a whimsical waltz.
meanings.sent5: The flames coquettes with the logs, flickering and dancing in the fireplace.
